sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from "@angular/core" import { CsvFileConverterService } from "src/app/services/csv-file-converter.service" import { TxtFileConverterService } from "src/app/services/txt-file-converter.service" import { CsvOptions } from "src/app/services/csv-converter.service" import { TxtToJsonOptions } from "src/app/services/txt-to-json.service" @Component({ selector: "app-file-uploader", templateUrl: "./file-uploader.component.html", styleUrls: ["./file-uploader.component.scss"], }) export class FileUploaderComponent { @Output() onConvert = new EventEmitter() @Output() onError = new EventEmitter() @Output() onFileClear = new EventEmitter() @Output() onOptionsChange = new EventEmitter() selectedFile: File | null = null fileType: "csv" | "txt" | null = null isProcessing = false // CSV options hasHeader = true skipEmptyLines = true selectedDelimiter = "," doubleQuoteWrap = true selectedRowDelimiter = "newline" rowPrefix = "" rowSuffix = "" selectedEncoding = "utf-8" selectedQuoteOption = "none" trimWhitespace = true // TXT options fieldCount = 3 selectedFieldIndex = 0 fieldConfigs = [ { start: 0, length: 10 }, { start: 10, length: 10 }, { start: 20, length: 10 }, ] constructor( private csvConverter: CsvFileConverterService, private txtConverter: TxtFileConverterService ) { } onFileSelect(event: any): void { const files = event.target.files if (files && files.length > 0) { this.selectedFile = files[0] this.fileType = null } } clearSelection(): void { this.selectedFile = null this.fileType = null const fileInput = document.getElementById("csvFileInput") as HTMLInputElement if (fileInput) fileInput.value = "" this.onFileClear.emit() } getCsvOptions(): CsvOptions { return { hasHeader: this.hasHeader, skipEmptyLines: this.skipEmptyLines, selectedDelimiter: this.selectedDelimiter, doubleQuoteWrap: this.doubleQuoteWrap, selectedRowDelimiter: this.selectedRowDelimiter, rowPrefix: this.rowPrefix, rowSuffix: this.rowSuffix, selectedEncoding: this.selectedEncoding, selectedQuoteOption: this.selectedQuoteOption, trimWhitespace: this.trimWhitespace, } } getTxtOptions(): TxtToJsonOptions { return { fieldCount: this.fieldCount, startPositions: this.fieldConfigs.map((c) => c.start), lengths: this.fieldConfigs.map((c) => c.length), hasHeader: this.hasHeader, skipEmptyLines: this.skipEmptyLines, } } async processData(): Promise { if (!this.selectedFile || !this.fileType) { this.onError.emit("Dosya ve tipi seçilmelidir.") return } this.isProcessing = true let result: any = null try { if (this.fileType === "csv") { const options = this.getCsvOptions() result = await this.csvConverter.convert(this.selectedFile, options) this.onOptionsChange.emit(options) } else if (this.fileType === "txt") { const options = this.getTxtOptions() result = await this.txtConverter.convert(this.selectedFile, options) this.onOptionsChange.emit(options) } else { this.onError.emit("Geçersiz dosya tipi") return } this.onConvert.emit(result) } catch (error) { this.onError.emit("Hata: " + error) } finally { this.isProcessing = false } } // opsiyon güncellemeleri tetikleyen UI event'leri aşağıya eklersin }

Upload a File

Select File Type

Field {{ (+selectedFieldIndex) + 1 }} Settings

Select a file to upload

Selected: {{selectedFile.name}} ({{(selectedFile.size / 1024).toFixed(1)}} KB) - {{fileType?.toUpperCase()}} file

Processing {{selectedFile?.name}}...
